sense.gloss: lover's whispers, sweet nothings, whispered intimacies

r_ele.r: ちょうちょうなんなん

sense.gloss: billing and cooing, holding an intimate, long-winded conversation in whispers
chu nom (formerly used Vietnamese script based on Chinese characters)
excuse me! (when calling out to someone)
chatteringly, wittering on, prattling on, blathering on
